text: Tumi laga bhai ke etu kineka kobo, ‘Bhai, tumi laga suku te ki letera ase etu ami sapha kori dibo’; aru tumi laga suku te dangor letera thaka to tumi dikha nai? Kopoti khan! Poila tumi suku te letera thaka to ulabi, titia he tumi sapha pora tumi bhai laga suku te letera thaka to ulabole paribo.
